forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: More Anti-Lag Tools

comments.text: Hi all! In trying to improve area speeds & voice transmission, here's some more anti-lag tools in version 165.8 (you're on [version])! Thx all!
The Me setting "Show Body Part counts" is now "Find Optimizations", and emits a red minus from those things which have a high messaging count (which can lag servers & crash areas)!
... e.g. it lets you find things using "when is/ then is" while flipping between 2 states fast. Such flipping, unless purely for animation, can increase lag and should be avoided.
There's a new "Uses variables" option in the Highlight dialog! (You can reach that dialog from the back of the Area dialog.)
There's plans for auto-curbing of parts with very high msg counts, but as I'll be on vacation from April 17-28, we wanna wait with things that need further post-release tuning :)

thread.latestCommentText: There's plans for auto-curbing of parts with very high msg counts, but as I'll be on vacation from April 17-28, we wanna wait with things that need further post-release tuning :)
